title: New loading issues
body:
The new loading issue, where your loading craps out, and you need to press "cancel" then reconnect... yeah, i got that, twice, while trying to ranked. 

by the time i tried reconnecting the 3rd time, the game was 'Remade', and it counted as a loss. I'd rather not stop playing league, but some leniency towards 'remake' LP loss? 

The issue is frequent, and happens to at least one person per game (From what i can see), so why is this still an issue? and why am i losing LP because of it?

TL;DR New issue lost me LP, feelsbadman.

replies.body: Until the bug is fixed, I advise playing normal games of any type (SR, TT, HA).
